DOC.brief_summary: In study investigator test hypothesis automate FiO2 adjustment increase time brain tissue oxygenation within intend reference range . Furthermore , investigator study change workload automate FiO2 adjustment compare manual adjustment nursing staff .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Automated Adjustment FiO2 Cerebral Arterial Oxygenation Preterm Infants
DOC.detailed_description: Recorded data brain tissue oxygenation compare reference data obtain study . Data experimental mode ( automated FiO2 control compare manual FiO2 control ) .
DOC.criteria: postmenstrual age < 30 wks GA study time nasal/nasopharyngeal CPAP mechanical ventilation ( include nasopharyngeal IMV ) least 4 desaturations ( SpO2 < 80 % ) 8 hour period within 24h study use standard pulse oximeter incorporate NICU ( Dash 3000 , General Electric , Freiburg ; 10 averaging time , delay 10 ) postnatal age < 96h ( exclude rapidly change condition early phase RDS avoid handle infant critical period IVH ) congenital cyanotic heart disease decision full treatment support Average FiO2 last 24h bevor active study phase > 0.60 Congenital malformation lung diaphragm ( i.e . diaphragmatic hernia , congentital cystic lung disease ... ) Clinically clear evidence seizure Ongoing Sepsis ( CRP > 10mg/l , positive blood culture , requirement catecholamine ) Need bloodtransfusion study
